definitions.definition: ( Australia , British , rail transport ) A passenger vehicle for public use that runs on tracks in the road (called a streetcar or trolley in North America).
A similar vehicle for carrying materials.
( US , rail transport ) A people mover .
( US ) A train with wheels that runs on a road; a trackless train .
( British , historical ) A car on a horse railway or tramway (horse trams preceded electric trams).
( obsolete ) The shaft of a cart .
( obsolete ) One of the rails of a tramway .

main_definition: ( Australia , British , rail transport ) A passenger vehicle for public use that runs on tracks in the road (called a streetcar or trolley in North America).
secondary_definitions: A similar vehicle for carrying materials.
( US , rail transport ) A people mover .
( US ) A train with wheels that runs on a road; a trackless train .
( British , historical ) A car on a horse railway or tramway (horse trams preceded electric trams).
( obsolete ) The shaft of a cart .
( obsolete ) One of the rails of a tramway .

definitions.definition: A silk thread formed of two or more threads twisted together, used especially for the weft , or cross threads, of the best quality of velvets and silk goods.

main_definition: ( weaving ) A silk thread formed of two or more threads twisted together, used especially for the weft , or cross threads, of the best quality of velvets and silk goods.
